All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AdminController
Controller class for handling administrator-related operations.
Administrator
Class representing an administrator in the hospital management system.
AdminView
Class representing the administrator view in the hospital management system.
Appointment
Class representing an appointment in the hospital management system.
AppointmentOutcome
Class representing the outcome of a completed appointment.
Config
Configuration class for storing application-wide constants.
Doctor
Class representing a doctor in the hospital management system.
DoctorController
Controller class for handling doctor-related operations.
DoctorView
Class representing the doctor view in the hospital management system.
HMSApplication
Main class to start the Hospital Management System application.
InventoryItem
Class representing an inventory item (medication) in the hospital.
LoginController
Controller class for handling user login and authentication.
LoginView
Class representing the login view for the hospital management system.
MedicalRecord
Class representing a medical record of a patient.
PasswordUtil
Utility class for password hashing and salt generation.
Patient
Class representing a patient in the hospital management system.
PatientController
Controller class for handling patient-related operations.
PatientView
Class representing the patient view in the hospital management system.
Pharmacist
Class representing a pharmacist in the hospital management system.
PharmacistController
Controller class for handling pharmacist-related operations.
PharmacistView
Class representing the pharmacist view in the hospital management system.
Prescription
Class representing a medication prescription.
SerializationUtil
Utility class for object serialization and deserialization.
SystemInitializer
Class to initialize system data for the Hospital Management System.
User
Abstract class representing a user in the hospital management system.
